summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing transportation charges for services rendered on August 15, 2002. It includes information about discounts applied, payment due date, and sender details, indicating a financial transaction related to shipping services.

persons.name: Darreen L. Noyke
persons.context: Darreen L. Noyke is listed as the sender of the package associated with the invoice.

persons.name: Maria Hodge
persons.context: Maria Hodge is also listed as a sender associated with the invoice.

persons.name: R. Francois
persons.context: R. Francois is noted as the individual who signed for the delivery on August 16, 2002.

events.title: Package Dropped Off
events.description: A package was dropped off for shipment on this date.

events.title: Package Delivered
events.description: The package was delivered on this date and signed for by R. Francois.

keyFacts: The invoice number is 4-347-16247, dated August 23, 2002.
Total charges for the FedEx services amounted to USD 18.36 after discounts.
The payment for the invoice is due by September 7, 2002.
The package was dropped off on August 15, 2002, and delivered on August 16, 2002.
R. Francois signed for the delivery of the package.
